name: India
description: A vibrant and diverse country known for its rich culture and history, and a popular filming destination.

content.title: Overview
content.body: **India** is a country located in South Asia, known for its vast landscapes, cultural heritage, and vibrant cities. It serves as a major hub for the film industry, both for Bollywood and international productions.

content.title: Film History
content.body: India has been the backdrop for numerous notable films. The historic city of **Jodhpur** doubled for Gotham City in **'The Dark Knight Rises'**. Various locations in India have been used in other famous movies like **'Slumdog Millionaire'**, showcasing the bustling streets of Mumbai, and **'The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel,'** set in the colorful landscapes of Rajasthan.

content.title: Visiting
content.body: India is accessible to the public with diverse attractions, ranging from the Himalayas in the north to tropical beaches in the south. Many film locations offer tours, such as the **Mehrangarh Fort in Jodhpur**, where visitors can experience the cinematic scenery firsthand. The country is generally welcoming to tourists with rich experiences in music, dance, cuisine, and festivals.
